$schema.description: Pointer to the schema against which this document should be validated (Schema URL/path)

submission.description: The submission part of the exercise

achievedPoints.description: The achieved points of the exercise

feedbackFile.description: A file path (relative to the submission directory) to a file that contains feedback information about the submission

points.description: The maximum points of the exercise

minimumPointsAllSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points was achieved over all submissions

minimumPointsPercentageAllSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved over all submissions

minimumPointsPercentagePerSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved for each submission

minimumPointsPerSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points was achieved for each submission

minimumSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum submission count was achieved over all submissions

minimumSubmissionsPercentage.description: If set checks if the given minimum submission count percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved over all submissions

progressName.description: Name of the progress that is represented by the data
